content.detailedDescription: It was 1978, two weeks before the big blizzard, between january 5th and febrary7th,  the place was3ewarwick, rhode island, the buttonwoods/appanoag section.  it was sometime3elate at night or early morning.  my parents were sleeping.3ei went to the bedroom window.  i observed round (like a ball) light,3eslowly decending to the ground.  the distance id guess was about a city3eblock away.  since i was a child, i said to myself, oh a plane light fell3eoff. i had not heard of ufos, etc.3e3ethe next day i went to my babysitters house.  i told he about the red3eplane light in a nonchalantly way.  it was not a big deal to me.  the3ebabysitters husband, worked at tf green airport in warwick about a mile3eaway.  when i recall his uniform it had decoration like an airforce3euniform.  i guess he might have been in the service somehow.  the3ebabysitter told her husband what i saw.3ethe husband came home and i overheard him telling his wife there was a lot3eof phone calls about the red light and that no airplanes lost lights.  he3eproceeded to question me about it.  i simply told him that i saw an3eairplane light fall. he made a phone call and then returned to work.3e3eas an adult now, i realize that an airplane light, if it fell off a plane,3ewould not still be lighted up red.  i researched old newspapers for any3emention of this incident.  for all the phone calls there supposedly were,3enot one mention in the local providence journal bulletin.  go figure
content.summary: January 25 to february 7 1978 warwick, rhode islan

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over these instructions.)please limit your narrative to 2000 words (equivalent to 6 typed pages). three elderly people travelling home had lights hover over and around their car. it paced them up rt.11 (ohio) for about 70 miles. during part of thispacing they lost power to their car. everything went black for awhile (duration unknown). after auto power returned they found an oily mist on their windshieldwith auto alarms sounding. they were very frightened and sped home. afterarrivingtoward their destination the lights departed toward the northeast. the autoclockgained 13 minutes and all the radio presets had to be reset the next day. thewoman driver experienced a noticeable personality change during the followingweek.
content.summary: Multiple lights pace ohio motorists

content.detailedDescription: A woman driving along a lakeshore observed a domed silvery disc, 60 feet indiameter, with 6-12 pulsating red lights around the rim that created an aura.After hovering initially, the object roughly paced the auto from near the shore,surging and slowing about twice per second. it also ascended quickly and nearlyvertically from 100 to 1,000 feet above the water, descended at a 45-degreeangle, and finally moved out of viewing range.
content.summary: Domed disc paced auto, then moved away.

content.detailedDescription: A woman arose to get a glass of water. in the hallway, she saw a whitish greybeing with large eyes, 4 1/2 feet tall, unclothed except for a glowing headband.The being floated a foot above the floor and moved away from her as sheapproached, slowly flapping its unjointed arms up and down. it pushed one armthrough the wall, causing blue and red sparks. it then moved totally into thewall. the woman remembered nothing from that moment forward but did recall theincident in the morning, considering it to be a ghost.
content.summary: Encounter with a grey being in a womans home.

content.detailedDescription: A woman driving toward the four corners area with her young daughter suddenlyhad a powerful urge to sleep. awaking 1 1/2 hours later, she observed a silverydisc, 300+ feet in diameter with a slightly raised dome, hovering just above theground nearby. she was instantly euphoric, then fearful. a telepathic voice toldher not to be afraid. the object tilted, then moved away slowly at first beforeextreme acceleration. the woman and daughter were both very nauseous for days,had a sunburn-like effect and hair loss.
content.summary: Ce with domed disc near four corners area.

content.detailedDescription: A gi on maneuvers awoke as he ejaculated and saw three humanoids, one sensed asfemale. the entities had grey-green skin, black almond-shaped eyes, pear-shapedheads, flat noses with nostrils, and slit mouths. the "female" asked the subjectabout the role of the military and how to keep humans alive for extendedtransport. he was told of future geophysical events leading to earths collisionwith a massive asteroid in 2006. the entities told him he and others would betaken from the earth in 2003. he was told of coming earthquakes (mexico,california, japan), icebergs breaking off the arctic glacier, and massiveflooding in southern us states.The subject awoke back in his sleeping bag without his clothes. he and twoothers were sent to an outpost and questioned by men in black suits. hecontinued to be asked what he recalled over the next five years.
content.summary: Gi abducted while on maneuvers.

content.detailedDescription: Woman awakened by a loud noise. observed an object 2-3 blocks away withbrilliant white lights obscuring the shape and illuminating the field below.Three smaller white lights a distance away formed a triangle. over 3 hours thewoman observed one light merge with the object and saw the object move towardthe remaining two lights. she finally returned to bed out of fear.Her older companion, upon being summoned, had quickly concluded the display wasfrom an airport several miles away or a train. he then returned to bed.
content.summary: Hovering object and separate white lights.

content.detailedDescription: Where were you and what were you doing at the time?   walking to visitfamily.What made you first notice the object?  strange pattern of lightswhat didyou think the object was when you first noticed it?  police helicopter describeyour reactions and actions during and after sighting the object.  well at firstwe were puzzled as to what it actually was, that we we seeing.   then it seemedas if we all were caught up in a slow motion sequence of a    film, and thingsseemed alot longer in duration than normal. describe the object and its actions. it was traveling north and pulsated in a rotation like a pattern, then shot   northeast very suddenly. that is when the pattern of the lights grew into  colors of red,green, and blue.  how did you lose sight of the object?   treesbelow made us loose the object.
content.summary: Rotating oval lights of red,green, and blue lights

content.detailedDescription: Object was first observed without any movement, looked like a streak of whitelight hovering in the air, after a few minutes object began to slowly move tothe north and began to slowly spin around.  it looked like a huge circularflorescent light bulb.  it was observed from a distance in the horizon andappeared to be huge, as it was large even from the distance.  when it began tospin there was a bright spot on it that could be observed going around andaround.  it moved slowly towards the north and then stopped and came back east,it was very bright at times and then fuzzy as if behind somekind of mist.  itwas all white.  i observed it for about 20 minutes before it disappeared behindclouds.
content.summary: Observed disk shaped white object

content.detailedDescription: A 10-year-old and two (nonreporting) 9-year-old friends awoke to a lightoutside. all observed a smallish triangular vehicle descending to a presumedlanding behind the home that was heard but not seen. later they saw three beingsat a glass door and windows, dressed respectively in blue, white and yellow,tight-fitting garments. one being was under 3 feet in height, one over 4 feetand one over 5 feet. all yelled for the mother of the 10-year-old to awaken butshe heard nothing. the next morning they and the mother discovered 15depressions in the ground forming a triangle.
content.summary: Children saw triangular vehicle & beings; found de

content.detailedDescription: A man outside observe a pea-sized red fireball-like object move overhead from wto e, then turn due s until it faded from view. estimated duration, 6 seconds.
content.summary: Fireball moved w to e, then turned s.

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). my wife and i were driving home, north on highway 99. we saw the objectnear the ashlan exit, appx 3 miles before our normal exit. it hovered over thetrain tracks along the highway. when we pulled along side it my wife said itmade no noise. it started moving ne. we got off the highway at our normal exitwith the ufo in sight. we detoured, now driving se, to catch up to it. we caughtup to it on san jose street, near brawly. it was just hovering there. we stoppedthe car and both got out. it hovered for 5 - 10 seconds, no noise at all. thatis when i noticed the three distinct corners with different light colors, red,blue26 white. it then stared off nw towards our home. we went home with the objectin sight, grabbed a pair of binoculors, and i watched it until losing it overthe nw horizon.
content.summary: Sighted triangle shaped object for 30 minutes
Battling ufos?????
Sighted a ufo  at 0430 hrs in india  march15 2000

content.detailedDescription: Three young adults walking across a soccer field near downtown des moines at12:45 am, 3/26/00, saw a bright steady red light, estimated several miles away,which appeared to hover and spurt repeatedly and angularly downward from 45 to25-30 degrees on a southerly course from the e to se sky over many minutes. asit moved, the light sometimes appeared to fade and shrink, then brighten again.It eventually ejected a smaller red light that slowly descended verticallytoward the ground, strobing as it moved. the main light then reversed course andmoved back in a norterly direction for a few minutes before being lost fromview. duration estimated to be about 25 minutes.
content.summary: Red steady light moving in spurts, w/smaller light

content.detailedDescription: 1) sand dunes natl monument, colorado.  we were at a campground in themountains at a high elevation and could see the sand dunes from where we were. we were outside looking out over the dunes.2) we had heard there was ufoactivity in the area from a man who claimed to be a member of nicap.  we weredeliberately searching the skies.3) a blinking star.4) we were excited andventured further away from the campground to try and see better.  we took acamera with us and took a few snapshots but they havent been developed yet.5)there were several.  two seemed to hover and pulsate light.  sometimes theydisappeared and reappeared above or below their original spot.  three others hada patterned blinking of lights.  at times it seemed as though they werecommunicating.  at one point a jet flew toward one of the stationary pulsatingobjects and seemed to be aimed directly at it, then suddenly went off track asthough it had been forced.6) we went inside and when we checked again they weregone.
content.summary: Military aircraft chase ufos near sand dunes natl

content.detailedDescription: 1. i was stopped to rest after a bike ride on a dead end street at about 10:30pm. 2.) i looked up to see the stars and i saw it. 3.) i new it was a ufo, itdidnt look like a was anything else. 4.) me and a friend were shocked, we keptlooking up at it 5.)it wasnt moving for a while, and then it started movingstraight but very slow. there was a bright light on the ufo, a yellow light. 6.We started to leave because my friend was scared. i looked back to catch anotherglimpse and it was gone, i didnt even see it leave, it was just gone.
content.summary: Me and a friend saw a bright light, fireball shape

content.detailedDescription: 5bmaybe 6 minutes5d and went into get my camera. when i returned to the street to take a snapshot they were gone. i have seen reports on the news about the lights and havedetermined that nobody knows what they are, however the most interesting thingabout it is the reaction of anyone i have talked to about it as they think imperhaps seeing things that arnt there.I wonder how many events go unreportedbecause of this reaction. enter your narrative description here (you can typeover these instructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to1 typed page).
content.summary: I have twice observed bright reddish lights in  ph

content.detailedDescription: Enter my wife and i were on a backpacking trip for two weeks. i first noticedthe object when we stopped to take pictures of the mountains. i had no idea whatit couldve been exept some sort of ufo. i immediatly grabbed the camera andtook a picture. its strange but i felt like i was being watched. once i tookthe picture, i went to grab the binoculars and when i turned around it was gone.
content.summary: Appeared to be saucer shaped/ i have a photo to be

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling in our car on highway 33 north towards casitassprings between 103a30 p.M. and 113a00 p.M. on thursday night.  looking north towards the mountains we both becameaware of a bright shiny green light that was falling at rapid speed. at first ithought we were seeing a falling star, because thats exacly what it lookedlike, but in an instant i realized something was wrong because it was green.  iasked my husband if he was seeing what i was seeing and he said, yes. i askedhim,22is that a falling star?22 and he said22i dont know.22  i said22its green isnt it?22, and he confirmed it.  we were both very calm, but curious. as it camecloser to the earth it seemed to fade, just as a falling star would have. itdisappeared as it reached the mountain, and i couldnt tell if it22landed22 behind or in front of it.  it was a very remote area, and very dark.  therewould have been no way we could have reached the area it seemed to disappear in. i asked my husband if we had just seen a ufo, but he didnt want to committ tothat.  later we convinced ourselves that it was probably a natural occurrence. i looked in the paper the next day for some explanation thinking that surelysomeone else had seen it, but there wasnt anything in the paper. when icouldnt find anything, my husband suggested that maybe i should report it afterall.  i still think that this was something natural that im just not aware of,but i cant think of who to ask except my husbands colleagues and the college im afraid of sounding kind of silly to tell you the truth. im very sorry tobother you with this, because i dont think it will be of any use to you, butim terribly curious.  thanks for you time.
content.summary: Green light that looked like a falling star

content.detailedDescription: Witness2_genderfemalewitness2_occupationhomemakeron aug 23, 2000 at approximately 1345hrs, i observed a white cylindrical objecttravelling ees to nnw. there were no visible windows/ports. also object did nothave any wings/vertical stabilizer. object did emit a small contrail forapproximately 100 ft. objects visual speed estimate was less than 10mph. objectdisappeared into a large cloud. weather in the salt lake city area at the timewas large strato-cumulus clouds over the mountains east of town and temp wasapproximatelty 90 degrees. no sounds or strange events preceeded or followedthis event.Witness3_age_groupage_groupwitness3_exact_agewitness3_genderwitness3_gender
content.summary: White cylindrical object, no wings, direction ees

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). my wife and i were on vacation in cabo san lucas mexico over mothers dayholiday .  we were having dinner on the beach at a resturant near the melia sanlucas hotel. the resturant had many tables and chairs with people all havingdinner on the beach.  i spotted an orange object approaching from the south veryslowly. i watched it for a while before i asked my wife donna to see what shethought. i also notest many other patrons pointing at the object as it cameclose to over head then seemed to track more east...It was followed by many.  itwas very unusual as it moved very slowly...It was quite large...Silent and veryorange in color.  i pointed the object to a young mexican waiter. he said thathe has seen these objects before. his grandfather told him that22that is the gold returning to la paz22. i guess that was some kind of joke?  weather is part of my profession in mytown. (eastern sierra weather services)i provide daily radio broadcasts for themedia and have served as expert witness in weather cases for legal firms.I amalso a storm spotter for the national weather service in reno, nv if you knowwhat kind of object this was by discription please let me know.Howard sheckter
content.summary: Solid orange ufo over cabo san lucas
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: A green triangle flashed by a 3 story window.  my witness only saw the flashfrom his peripheral vision, as he was not facing the window.  i saw the flashand the green triangle flew by in about 3 seconds.  it appeared from the nw andflew to the se direction and vanished. no interruption from the radio, noelectrical interruption, no affects whatsoever.  the building is on the top of ahill and we were on the 3rd story.
content.summary: A green triangle flew past a 3 story window.

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage).My girlfriend went into our backyard to have a cigarette at approx. 113a20 pm. she observed a bright point of light to the north that was moving tothe south. she called me outside to observe it because we like to viewsatellites and stars and planets together.I came outside and immediately observed the object she pointed out as amoderately bright pinpoint that moved like a satellite (which we cannot normallysee from within the city due to light pollution). within 10 seconds of myobservation of t
content.summary: High atitude point source light increased in brigh

content.detailedDescription: I was walking past one of our buildings, just about to get off the phone whenistarted to notice some static in the phone. i didnt think alot about it untilmy dog started making a curious face and star

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a red light and noticed a grey, egg shaped craft coming fromthe north. it was flying lower than any airplane i have ever seen and i couldsee it very clearly. it had rectangular 22bumps 22 on it and didnt make asound. i was excited and wanted to get out of my car and get other people tolook but i would have been too embarrassed. the object never did anythingspecial and continued to fly in a straight path until i could no longer see it(it was so low that a 1 story building blocked sight of it). i told my familyabout it but havent told anyone else until now.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of flying object

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). at 2015 hrs. local time (mst) on 8/192f2000, my daughter, her boyfriend and i were standing on our driveway lookingeast.  i looked up and noticed a fast moving light going from the west to theeast.  i observed it travel an arc of over 90 degrees in less than one minute. during most of the ovservation i was using minox 10x25 glasses.  the objectappeared to be a greenish white color.  it seemed to be quite high and no soundwas heard.  i am unable to give an estimate of its altitude.  using my 10x25glasses i wa
content.summary: Observation of ufo over phoenix
